Purpose: To detect and quantify 6-Monoacetylmorphine (6-MAM) in urine for clinical or forensic assessment while maintaining chain of custody.
Container: Sterile urine collection container without preservatives
Equipment: Siemens Multistix 10SG/8SG for preliminary urinalysis; Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography-Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) for confirmatory analysis
